kinetic.simulator

Class KineticSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • kinetic.simulator.KineticSimulator

  • public class KineticSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulator boot-strap class.

    Applications may use this class to start new instance(s) of the simulator.

    There is a main method provided in this class as a reference to start a new instance of simulator.

    Applications may also define their own SimulatorConfigration instances and start the simulator with customized configurations.

    See Also:
    SimulatorConfiguration

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the simulator instance and release all associated resources.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        A default simulator instance boot-strap method. If no arguments are specified, port 8123 is used as the service port and user's home folder is used as the home folder for the simulator.
        Parameters:
        args - Two optional arguments may be provided. If one argument is present, it is used as the service port for the simulator. If two arguments are present, the second is used as the home folder for the simulator.
